title: Never use words to say what a gif can say for you.

replies.body: You should have used a gif for the title then.
http://16536-presscdn-0-47.pagely.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/giphy-mckellen.gif
Magneto got quite nice and cozy in that one

You are right, it is Magneto! I did not recognize him at first.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/247/938/528.gif

ps: I did recognize it was the same actor. It was a joke.

i thought it was gandalf

http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/gandalf_to_the_music.gif
Wha...why even wear a fucking hood if he's wearing his armor AND CAPE!
http://www.thingsinsquares.com/wp-content/uploads/tree-nazi-comic.jpg

That is not a gif

Third wheeling it hard... Feels so good D;.

http://media3.giphy.com/media/sYZKDEAYEWJl6/giphy.gif

both of you
Question is: Where can I find gifs to start looking for how I want to express myself?

http://www.reactiongifs.com/ is a good place to start.

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/welcome.gif
http://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lq56p5ksRD1qe8a0fo6_250.gif

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/wltz.gif

Ta-Da!
https://media.giphy.com/media/vmITjnUT56et2/giphy.gif

I look at my team:
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5m7lf1N3O1rul0hko1_400.gif

But somehow we pull off a win:
http://38.media.tumblr.com/2c01c19d435ee80f81fa0b55142e22b7/tumblr_inline_o0rn0c8YTx1qietwz_500.gif

Then I realize its ARAM and we win:
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Staring-Confused-Ron-Swanson.gif
A picture says a thousand words. A gift is a moving picture, and often has words on it.

Than, with each frame... Th' possible numbers of this...
**_Th' possibilities..._**

http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lmjfdi6kXm1qjrd1eo1_500.gif
Since when did GIFs relate solely to league WutFace
They don't, but he's allowed to spam and waste space at the front page of the boards because apparently he's immune to reports.
